alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Chester; Union; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 12:40PM EST until January 09 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM EST FOR NORTHWESTERN CHESTER...WESTERN YORK...SOUTHEASTERN CHEROKEE AND NORTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES... At 1240 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of York to 9 miles east of Union, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Monarch Mill, Lockhart, Sharon, Hickory Grove, Smyrna, Kings Mountain State Park, Adamsburg, Bullock Creek, Bethany, and Kings Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for Upstate South Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
